Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor to continuously track database performance metrics such as CPU usage, memory consumption, and query execution times. Identify and address performance bottlenecks.
Ensure that the PostgreSQL database is updated with the latest security patches and updates provided by Azure. Schedule updates during maintenance windows to minimize downtime.
Configure and verify automated backups for the PostgreSQL database. Perform periodic manual backups to ensure data integrity and availability.
Conduct regular disaster recovery drills to ensure that backups can be restored successfully and that failover mechanisms are functioning as expected.
Analyze and optimize slow-running queries using the Query Performance Insights tool. Implement indexing and query optimization techniques as needed.
Review and audit database access logs to ensure compliance with security policies. Identify and address unauthorized access attempts.
Monitor resource utilization and scale up or down the database resources (CPU, memory, storage) as needed to meet workload demands.
Review and update firewall rules to ensure only authorized IP addresses can access the PostgreSQL database. Remove outdated or unnecessary rules.
Regularly review database logs for any anomalies or unusual activity. Investigate and resolve any identified issues.
Keep all operational and configuration documentation for the PostgreSQL database up-to-date, including backup procedures, failover steps, and security configurations.
Rebuild or reorganize database indexes to ensure optimal query performance and reduce fragmentation.
Ensure that high availability configurations, such as read replicas or failover groups, are functioning correctly and meet the required SLA.
Provide training to database administrators and users on best practices for using and maintaining the PostgreSQL database.
Regularly review the database's performance and availability to ensure compliance with the SLA. Address any deviations promptly.
Rotate encryption keys used for securing the PostgreSQL database to comply with security policies and best practices.
